source_info.purpose: With the limited resources at the Society / Village level, we have utilised an amount of Rs.48,660/= to meet up the expenses on account of Repair

A proposal has been submitted to the Ministry of Culture Govt. of India, in due course of time but due to COVID-19 problems the sanctioned order or minutes of Meeting are not issued so far.  However, the Society has actively working in the field of Education, Preservation of Cultural
